desc: Are items sliding off from the open shelf in your Model S or X all the time? I was sick of things falling out every time our Tesla accelerated. I just had to fix this, and the Teslatray was the result. Perfect for sunglasses, keys and other small items. Stays in place during launch. Handmade in Norway. Fits all S/X.

layout.text:
all Tesla S/X deserves a Teslatray
fits all models 2012-2020
- Carina -
